short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens a URL in a small window on any webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to open a pop-up window in which you can enter any link, making it easier to access frequently visited sites. This can be particularly useful for people who want to quickly access specific web pages without having to navigate through their bookmarks or perform a search.
